General.Name: VOGO SA
General.Description: VOGO SA develops, markets, and distributes live and replay, and audio and video solutions for spectators and professionals in sports arenas. Its solutions include VOGO SPORT, a solution that gives spectators transforms the stadium experience by providing multicamera content on demand for viewing on tablets and smartphones irrespective of the number of people connected, as well as video solution provides analytical and decision-making tools used in referee assistance, medical diagnostics, coaching, etc. It also provides Vokkero, a wireless communication solution for the sports industry. In addition, the company serves industry and healthcare sectors. VOGO SA was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Montpellier, France.
General.Address: Immeuble les Centuries II, Montpellier, France, 34000
